to_cluster¶

clustertools.analysis.operations.to_cluster(cluster, do_order=False, do_key_params=False, centre_method=None)[source]¶

NAME:

to_cluster

PURPOSE:

Shift coordinates to clustercentric reference frame

INPUT:

do_order - re-sort cluster radii (default: False)

do_key_params - call key_params after shift (default: False)

centre_method - method for shifting to clustercentric coordinates when units=’radec’ and origin=’sky’.

NOTES:

When units=’radec’ and origin=’sky’, the cluster will be shifted to clustercentric coordinates using:

centre_method=None: angular distance between each star’s RA/DEC and the RA/DEC of the cluster’s centre with proper motions directly subtracted off centre_method=’orthographic’ , positions and velocities changed to orthnormal coordinates (Helmi et al. 2018) centre_method=’VandeVen’ , positions and velocities changed to clustercentric coordinates using method outlined by Van de Ven et al. 2005

Note the the line of site positions and velocities will just have the galactocentric coordinates of the cluster subtracted off. Be sure to set projected=True when making any calculations to use only x and y coordinates

OUTPUT:

None

HISTORY:

2018 - Written - Webb (UofT)
